Home Libraries People FAQ More

cs_tag

Meta-function returning coordinate system tag (cs family) of any geometry.

Synopsis 

template<typename G>
struct cs_tag
{
  // ...
};

Template parameter(s)

Parameter

Description

typename G

Header

Either

#include <boost/geometry/geometry.hpp>

Or

#include <boost/geometry/core/cs.hpp>
